title: How to Use Real Estate Hashtags for Instagram to Get More Leads
excerpt: Key Points Hashtags help Instagram’s algorithm find and show your content to buyers and sellers Real estate hashtags need to be local, relevant, and specific…
content:
Key Points

  • Hashtags help Instagram’s algorithm find and show your content to buyers and sellers
  • Real estate hashtags need to be local, relevant, and specific to stand out
  • Use a mix of broad, niche, and branded hashtags for best visibility
  • Track hashtag performance to improve engagement and eliminate useless tags
  • Tools like Flick and RiteTag make researching effective hashtags faster and easier
  • Branded hashtags build trust and boost client-generated visibility
  • Consistency across platforms strengthens brand awareness and client recall
  • Hyperlocal tags convert better than general hashtags
  • Seasonal and trending hashtags keep your posts timely and searchable
  • Hashtags won’t save bad content – but they will supercharge good strategy

Instagram can feel like shouting into a void – except the void is full of half-baked motivational quotes and other agents doing backflips in front of listings. If your posts are getting crickets while someone else’s “#SOLD” selfie is pulling in leads, it’s not because their listing is better. It’s because their real estate hashtags for Instagram are doing the heavy lifting.

Let’s be real: Instagram doesn’t care that you just staged the perfect open house. The algorithm needs clues. That’s where the right Instagram real estate hashtags come in – they put your post in front of the people most likely to hire you, not just your cousin or that one guy from high school who flips NFTs now.

So, do hashtags work on Instagram? Only if you stop copy-pasting #blessed and start using hashtags that actually target buyers, sellers, and your local market. This post breaks down the best strategy, including what’s working in real estate hashtags 2025, how to use the top real estate hashtags effectively, and which realtor hashtags for Instagram won’t make you look like you just discovered the app.

Understanding Real Estate Hashtags
Types of Real Estate Hashtags
Creating a Strong Hashtag Strategy
Tools and Tips to Find the Best Hashtags
Why Hashtags Matter More Than Ever in 2025
Frequently Asked Questions

Understanding Real Estate Hashtags

What Are Real Estate Hashtags?

Think of hashtags like real estate signs – but digital and slightly less ugly. When you tag your content with a real estate hashtag, you’re giving Instagram’s algorithm a label to file your post under. You’re not just saying “I’m a real estate agent,” you’re saying “Hey algorithm, show this to people looking for homes in Scottsdale under $800K who also happen to like dogs and mid-century modern kitchens.”

When used right, real estate agent hashtags become one of the most effective (and free) forms of real estate agent marketing available. The trick is choosing tags that actually attract the right eyeballs, not just other agents fishing for likes.

Types of Real Estate Hashtags

Not all hashtags are built the same – and no, dumping #RealEstate on every post isn’t a strategy, it’s a shrug. To actually make real estate hashtags for Instagram work, you need a mix. Think of hashtags like a toolbox: each category does a different job. If you’re only using a hammer, you’re definitely missing the screws.

Here’s a breakdown of the main real estate hashtag categories:

1. General Real Estate Hashtags

These are the broad, widely-used tags like #RealEstate, #Realtor, and #RealEstateAgent. They’re popular across the platform and help categorize your content within the larger real estate conversation.

2. Property-Specific Hashtags

These hashtags describe the type of listing or event being promoted, such as #LuxuryListing, #MillionDollarViews, #JustListedLA, #OpenHouseSunday, or #TourThisHome.

3. Style Tags

Style tags speak to the visual design or unique character of a property. Examples include #ModernFarmhouse, #VictorianVibes, #ColonialHomeForSale, #FamilyFriendlyListing, and #BungalowLiving.

4. Location-Based Hashtags

These hashtags are tied to geographic areas, like #DenverHomesForSale, #NYCRealty, #PhoenixRealtor, #NashvilleRealEstate, #MarinCountyHomes, #ScottsdaleLuxury, and #SeattleRealtorLife. They’re especially useful for targeting local audiences.

5. Branded Hashtags

A branded hashtag is unique to you or your team. It typically includes your name, business name, or a catchphrase, such as #HomesWithHannah, #SoldBySmithTeam, or #ExpRealtyElite.

6. Trending and Seasonal Tags

These are based on time-sensitive events or market trends. In 2025, examples include #SpringHomeSale, #InterestRateDrop, and #FallMarket2025.

Creating a Strong Hashtag Strategy

Using hashtags without a plan is like putting a yard sign in the wrong zip code – you might get views, but not from the people who’ll actually call you. If you want your real estate hashtags for Instagram to lead to real conversations (and closings), you need a strategy that’s consistent, relevant, and client-focused.

Here’s how to make that happen:

1. Use the Right Hashtag for the Right Post

Hashtags only work when they actually match what you’re posting. If you’re showing a family-friendly colonial in Atlanta, skip #LuxuryLoftNYC and go with:

  • #ColonialHomeForSale
  • #FamilyFriendlyListing
  • #AtlantaHomes

Instagram’s algorithm picks up on context. Using specific, relevant tags helps your content show up in the right searches – by the right people.

2. Balance Popular and Niche Tags

Popular hashtags like #RealEstate get lots of reach, but also tons of competition. Niche hashtags like #EcoFriendlyHomes or #FirstTimeBuyerDallas might get fewer views – but those views are way more targeted.

Your best bet? Use a smart mix of both:

  • 2–3 broad industry tags
  • 4–6 hyperlocal or niche-specific tags
  • 1–2 branded or campaign-specific tags

This gives your post wide visibility without getting lost in the noise.

3. Leverage Location-Based Tags for Local Leads

Location tags are where conversions happen. Whether you’re posting listings, open houses, or market updates, always include hashtags that highlight your area – down to the neighborhood or zip code if possible.

Examples:

  • #Marin94920
  • #ScottsdaleLuxury
  • #SeattleHomes

This is how you turn Instagram from a vanity metric machine into a real lead funnel.

4. Build a Branded Hashtag That Gets Shared

A branded hashtag makes your business recognizable – but a great branded hashtag turns your clients into walking testimonials.

Create a tag that fits your brand – #SoldBySarah, #HomesWithHannah, #ExpRealtyElite – and use it everywhere:

  • Every listing and success story post
  • Your Stories Highlights and bio
  • Postcards, signs, email footers – anything client-facing

Want it to work even harder? Get your clients in on it. Include your hashtag on move-in gifts, offer a simple incentive like “Tag your new home with #SoldBySarah for a housewarming gift,” and feature their posts in your feed or Stories.

Just like that, your branded tag turns into a mini-portfolio – building trust, boosting visibility, and showing future clients why they should work with you.

5. Stay Consistent Across All Platforms

Don’t let your hashtag strategy live (and die) only on Instagram. Use your core and branded hashtags across:

  • Facebook Reels and posts
  • LinkedIn updates
  • YouTube Shorts
  • Marketing materials – online and offline

Consistency reinforces your brand and helps potential clients connect the dots no matter where they find you.

6. Track What’s Working – and What’s Not

Hashtag success isn’t about guessing. It’s about tracking what drives action. Use Instagram Insights or tools like Flick, Later, or Meta’s Creator Studio to monitor:

  • Which hashtags bring profile visits and post saves
  • Which ones get shares, DMs, or actual leads
  • Which ones are just noise

Then double down on what works and ditch what doesn’t. That’s how you create your own list of top real estate hashtags – based on real performance, not a random blog post.

Tools and Tips to Find the Best Hashtags

If you’ve been Googling “best real estate hashtags” and hoping a magic list will just appear and solve your engagement problems, welcome to the club. The truth is, there’s no one-size-fits-all. The hashtags that work for that high-rise condo agent in Miami probably won’t help you sell a craftsman in Boise.

So, how do you find the top real estate hashtags that actually work for your market and listings? You use the right tools and some good old-fashioned digital eavesdropping.

1. Monitor Real Estate Market Trends

A good hashtag for real estate agents in 2025 adapts to the market. Use trending topics that align with what buyers or sellers care about right now:

  • #LowInventory
  • #MoveInReady
  • #InterestRateWatch
  • #JustSoldInYourZipCode

Tracking seasonal shifts, economic news, and buyer sentiment helps you use real estate hashtags 2025 that are timely and searchable. Bonus: it positions you as a knowledgeable agent (not just another photo dump machine).

2. Follow the Real Estate Creators Who Are Crushing It

Start by finding 5-10 real estate agents or creators in your market (or niche) who are already getting solid engagement on Instagram. These aren’t your high school friends who post once a month – they’re the ones regularly showing up in the Explore feed and getting real interaction (not just fire emojis from bots).

Watch what Instagram real estate hashtags they use. Do they go hyperlocal? Are they using style tags? Are they sneaking in branded content in clever ways? Take notes and apply what fits your brand and audience.

Bonus tip: interact with their content. You’ll learn faster and maybe build some real estate networking perks on the side.

3. Use Hashtag Research Tools

No shame in getting help from a robot. These tools take the guesswork out of hashtags and give you real data:

  • Flick: Shows hashtag performance, banned tags, and engagement stats
  • RiteTag: Tells you which hashtags are hot right now vs. evergreen
  • Display Purposes: Auto-generates relevant hashtags based on your keywords
  • Meta’s Creator Studio (free): Decent for Instagram if you’re already posting consistently

These tools are gold when testing and refining your list of real estate agent hashtags that get actual traction, not just vanity metrics.

Why Hashtags Matter More Than Ever in 2025

Hashtags aren’t just caption fluff – they’re one of the easiest ways to get seen by actual clients instead of just fellow agents and bots. When used strategically, real estate hashtags for Instagram help you show up in local searches, boost your visibility, and keep your posts from getting buried in the algorithm abyss.

If you’re serious about turning posts into pipelines, choosing the right hashtag strategy matters just as much as choosing the right brokerage.

Speaking of brokerages…

When you choose Smart Agent Alliance as your sponsor at eXp Realty, you don’t just get the only profitable brokerage in the past 5 years with the highest rating by anonymous agent reviews. You also get the eXp sponsor firepower of not one, but two sponsor teams, Smart Agent Alliance + the Wolf Pack. Together, we’re two of the most respected, support-driven teams at eXp. We cover what agents actually need – community, training, and passive revenue share income support. Curious about passive income? Try our Revenue Share Calculator. Curious about how much more commission you’ll keep at eXp? Try our eXp Commission Calculator.

Here’s what you get all for FREE when you join eXp and name a Smart Agent Alliance founder as your sponsor. We help you grow passive income with: a personal agent attraction page, webinars & automated agent follow-up, a top-ranked team site, 8 landing pages with email automation to get leads while you’re doing something else,100s of gorgeous plug-and-play marketing templates. quick-start agent production plans & agent portal access to everything eXp and Smart Agent Alliance. Plus you’ll also get high level coaching & community with weekly strategy calls, Social Agent Academy Pro ($10.5K value), training on flipping, production & systems, private groups for referrals & support.

You could choose a random eXp sponsor and hope you don’t get the all-too-common sponsor choice regrets. Or you could plug into a team that already built the engine, so all you have to do is drive. To learn more about eXp Realty.

Also, learn more helpful marketing ideas here or check out our Agent Support Hub for other ideas.

Frequently Asked Questions

Do real estate hashtags work on Instagram?

Yes, real estate hashtags still help your posts reach new people in 2025. They tell Instagram who to show your content to, especially when targeting local buyers or sellers.

What are the best real estate hashtags for Instagram in 2025?

The best real estate hashtags in 2025 are hyperlocal, niche-specific, and relevant to your audience – like #DenverHomesForSale or #FirstTimeBuyerDallas.

How many hashtags should a real estate agent use on Instagram?

Most agents see the best results with 8–12 hashtags per post. Mix broad, niche, and branded tags to maximize reach and relevance.

Should I create a branded hashtag for my real estate business?

Yes. A branded hashtag helps build your reputation and makes it easier for clients to tag and share their experience with you.

How do I know if my hashtags are working?

Use Instagram Insights or tools like Flick or Later to track engagement, reach, and conversions from your hashtag strategy.

Step 1: Get Licensed & Join eXp Realty

First things first: you need your real estate license. Every state has its own version of the “jump-through-these-hoops” dance with different pre-license education, exams, and paperwork. That’s where eXp Realty changes the game for new real estate agents.

Step 2: Your First 90 Days at eXp Realty

This is where eXp Realty makes the biggest difference for new real estate agents – and honestly, where most traditional brokerages drop the ball.

At a lot of brokerages, your first 90 days look like this: “Congrats! You’re licensed. Now go find clients. Good luck.” Translation: You’re on your own, kid. Not at eXp Realty.

From day one, you’re plugged into actual structure, support, and new real estate agent training designed to help you close deals, not just sit through some monthly coffee chat that leaves you more confused than when you started.

  • 60+ live classes every single week inside eXp World.

Bottom line? Your first 90 days at eXp Realty aren’t about “hoping it works.”
It’s a system designed to give new agents structure, training, mentorship, and lead generation tools from day one – so you’re stacking deals, not stacking unpaid bills.

Alright – this is where things really start to snowball.

Step 5: Build Momentum, Close Deals, and Scale Your Business

By this stage, you’re no longer guessing where your next client is hiding. Thanks to eXp Realty’s systems combined with Smart Agent Alliance’s sponsor team support, you’re running an actual business, not playing real estate roulette.

You’ve got:

  • And most importantly, you’re making actual money instead of burning through your savings trying to figure it out.

While most new real estate agents struggle for months (or years) trying to piece together a system, many of our agents are writing their first contracts within their first 60–90 days.

And as your pipeline grows, you’re also starting to unlock additional income streams like revenue share passive income – something very few traditional real estate brokerages offer to new agents at all.

You’re no longer “trying real estate.”

Here’s the ugly truth most brokerages won’t say out loud: The majority of new real estate agents don’t fail because they’re bad at selling houses. They fail because they never got the systems, training, or support to actually build consistent income before the bills started stacking up.

That’s exactly why eXp Realty and Smart Agent Alliance exist – to eliminate that first-year failure trap.

You don’t need to reinvent the wheel. You just need to plug into a system that’s already working.

The Bottom Line: The Right Brokerage Changes Everything for New Agents

Starting your real estate career doesn’t have to feel like you’re juggling flaming swords while blindfolded. With eXp Realty’s modern brokerage platform and the added coaching, systems, and mentorship from Smart Agent Alliance, you’re not guessing your way through year one – you’re stacking closings, building momentum, and setting up multiple income streams from the start.

Because here’s the reality: where you hang your license matters just as much as who you partner with.

When you join Smart Agent Alliance at eXp Realty, you’re not just signing up for another virtual brokerage. But here’s the kicker – no matter how many homes you sell, your income hits zero every time the calendar flips.

Traditional brokerages talk a big game, but most of them are just dressed-up commission machines. You grind, they grow. You stop, it’s game over. No stock. No passive income. No ownership.

eXp Realty flips that script. It’s the only online real estate brokerage where top agents aren’t just producers – they’re owners, investors, and revenue share earners with actual exit plans that don’t involve burnout or blind optimism.

So if you’re ready to stop padding someone else’s empire and start stacking equity and passive income, keep reading.

The Problem with Transaction-Only Brokerages
How eXp Realty Builds Wealth in Layers (Not Just One-and-Done Deals)

The Problem with Transaction-Only Brokerages

Most real estate brokerages are built on a simple (and brutal) formula: Close deal ? Get commission ? Start all over like it’s Groundhog Day.

It doesn’t matter if you’re the top dog on the leaderboard or just squeaked in your first luxury listing – the second you stop selling, the money stops too. There’s no ownership, no equity, and definitely no passive income. Just a fancy title, maybe a plaque, and a whole lot of hustle.

You’re constantly trading time for money like it’s a sustainable business model. Spoiler: it’s not.

Without revenue sharing, stock, or any kind of wealth-building infrastructure, your “career” is just a never-ending loop of listings and lockboxes with no endgame in sight.

How eXp Realty Builds Wealth in Layers (Not Just One-and-Done Deals)

At eXp Realty, yes – your production still matters. But unlike the usual “congrats, now do it again” reward system at traditional brokerages, every deal you close can unlock stock, equity, and passive income. Think of it as wealth-building on autopilot – baked right into your business model.

? Stock Awards (a.k.a. Equity for Doing What You Already Do)

You sell homes – eXp hands you stock.

  • Cap or go ICON, and the stock bonuses get even juicier.

? Revenue Share Income (a.k.a. Passive Income That Actually Exists)

Bring another agent to eXp Realty? Great. If they close deals, you get paid a slice of the revenue, not from them, but from the company.

  • Curious how big this can get? Try the Revenue Share Calculator and see for yourself.
  • That means recurring monthly income, whether you’re showing homes or sipping wine.
  • It scales as your agent network grows – even if you’re not actively selling.

? Stock Purchase Plan (a.k.a. Forced Wealth for Smart Agents)

Want to buy eXp stock at a discount without thinking about it? Just opt in:

  • Automatically invest 5% of each commission check.
  • Build equity behind the scenes while you focus on selling.

What Experienced Agents Say After Making the Switch

Ask any experienced agent who’s been with eXp Realty for a few years, and you’ll hear eerily similar stories:

  • “I realized I had spent years building my broker’s wealth – and none of my own.”

Here’s what else they’re saying:

And over on Reddit, seasoned agents quietly admit:

The theme is loud and clear: with eXp Realty, it’s not just about sales, it’s about unlocking real ownership, lifelong equity, and a revenue share model that keeps paying, even when your schedule finally gives you a break.

Wealth at eXp Realty Isn’t an Accident – It’s the Blueprint

Traditional brokerages love to say, “Just close more deals,” like that’s a long-term strategy. Hustle harder, build your pipeline, stay in production forever – but when it comes to actual financial freedom? You’re on your own.

eXp Realty flips that logic on its head. Wealth-building isn’t a perk – it’s baked into the business model:

  • Keep more of your commission from day one with the 80/20 split and low cap.
  • Earn stock just for doing what you already do – closing deals.
  • Build recurring revenue through agent attraction – income that doesn’t depend on your next open house.

This isn’t “grind now, hope later.” It’s structured, scalable, and designed to pay you like a business owner, not just a producer.

You’ve Built a Career – Now Build Wealth That Outlasts It

You don’t need another script or sales course. You need a platform that pays you like the pro you are:

  • ? Bigger take-home pay
  • ? Equity that stacks over time
  • ? Passive income that scales
  • ? An actual exit plan that isn’t burnout

That’s eXp Realty – and it’s why experienced agents are trading commission-only chaos for a smarter, wealth-building future.

Why Your eXp Realty Sponsor Matters – And What Makes Smart Agent Alliance Different

And here’s where eXp Realty gets even smarter: unlike traditional brokerages, eXp allows sponsors – not brokers – to provide direct support, coaching, and systems to the agents they personally bring in. That means the real value doesn’t come from some regional manager who’s never met you – it comes from the sponsor team you choose.

Smart Agent Alliance is one of the fastest-growing teams at eXp – and we’re actually two powerhouse teams in one: Smart Agent Alliance + the Wolf Pack. That means double the support, double the strategy, and yes – still 100% free.

In fact, we’re the only major eXp sponsor team that gives everything away for free. No upsells. No bait-and-switch. No “premium tier” hiding the good stuff. You get full access from day one – and we cover the cost because that’s what real support looks like.

But don’t confuse “free” with “basic.” Our tools and systems are so valuable, we literally sell them to agents outside our team. Other coaches charge $10,000–$20,000 for similar programs (and yeah, ours are better). Plus, we’re constantly improving – and next month, we’re dropping our most powerful resource yet. Our team gets it free. Everyone else? They’ll be buying in.

Just name a Smart Agent Alliance founder as your primary sponsor in your join us eXp application, you get instant access to our full value stack – including a personalized agent attraction funnel, automated follow-up, top social media training, lead-gen tools, custom landing pages, high-level training, and live weekly strategy calls. We even hand you plug-and-play marketing templates and a proven plan to grow your revenue share faster.

It’s the kind of sponsor-driven support that most agents wish they had picked the first time around. Want to learn more about this opportunity?  Secure your webinar spot today, then book a private call with Smart Agent Alliance.

What is the eXp Realty wealth-building model?

eXp Realty wealth building includes stock awards, revenue share, and equity programs that reward agents for production and referrals – not just closings.

Agents earn eXp stock for hitting milestones like doing their first deal each year, capping and becoming ICON agents, plus they can buy stock at a discount using the optional stock purchase plan.

Revenue share is income agents earn when others they sponsor join eXp and close deals. It’s paid by the company, not out of agent commissions.

Yes. Revenue share creates monthly passive income, and stock ownership builds long-term equity – helping agents earn even when they’re not actively selling.

title: Should Experienced Agents Join eXp Realty? 5 Truths You Need to Hear
excerpt: Key Points Switching brokerages is a serious move, especially for experienced agents with strong brands. At eXp Realty, agents keep full control of their personal…
content:
Key Points

  • Switching brokerages is a serious move, especially for experienced agents with strong brands.
  • At eXp Realty, agents keep full control of their personal brand and marketing.
  • eXp offers better support through its cloud-based model and Regus office access.
  • eXp Realty is not a pyramid scheme – revenue share is tied to real agent production.
  • Passive income is optional and built through revenue sharing, not required recruiting.
  • Agents who regret joining eXp usually regret not joining sooner.
  • eXp lets agents leave freely and take their signed contracts – no penalties.
  • The real difference comes from choosing the right sponsor team.
  • Smart Agent Alliance offers free training, systems, and lead-gen tools to help agents succeed.

If you’re an experienced agent, odds are you’ve heard the pitch: great commission splits, stock awards, revenue sharing – the eXp Realty highlight reel. Sounds great… until you realize switching brokerages isn’t a cute little side quest. It’s a full-blown business decision.

You’ve built something that works. Clients trust you. Your brand is dialed in. So naturally, the idea of moving to a virtual real estate brokerage like eXp can feel like stepping onto a moving treadmill – blindfolded. And that’s where the fear creeps in.

“Will I lose control of my brand?”
“Will my clients think I’m desperate?”
“Is this some kind of pyramid scheme in disguise?”

We get it – and we’re not here to sugarcoat or sell you a dream. We’re here to give it to you straight. So let’s break down the 5 biggest fears experienced agents have about joining eXp Realty – and the truth behind each one.

Key Points
Fear #1 – “Will I Lose My Brand at eXp Realty?”
Fear #2 – “Will My Clients Care If I Switch Brokerages?”
Fear #3 – “Will I Still Get Support Without a Physical Office?”
Fear #4 – “Is eXp Realty a Pyramid Scheme?”
Fear #5 – “What If I Regret Joining eXp Realty?
Addressing the Real Fears Allows You to See the Real Opportunity
A Smarter Move with Smart Agent Alliance
Frequently Asked Questions

Should experienced agents join eXp Realty?
Do I have to give up my brand if I join eXp Realty?
Will my clients care if I switch to eXp Realty?
How does support work at a virtual brokerage like eXp?
Is eXp Realty a pyramid scheme?
What if I join eXp and regret it?
What does Smart Agent Alliance offer agents who join?

Fear #1 – “Will I Lose My Brand at eXp Realty?”

This one pops up constantly, and it’s usually fueled by agents who’ve never even looked at how eXp works.

The truth? You keep your brand. Period.

Unlike franchise brokerages that force you into a beige box with their logo slapped on everything, eXp Realty agents can build their personal brand however they want. You’re not required to use company branding or hand over your creative control.

At eXp Realty:

  • You just add “brokered by eXp Realty” in the fine print, like any other affiliation.
  • Your logo stays.
  • Your marketing style stays.
  • Your online and offline presence stays.

In fact, many top producers say their personal brand grew faster once they left the franchise leash. With no broker-imposed design rules, your brand can finally do what it was always meant to: stand out.

So no, you won’t lose your brand at eXp. You’ll finally get to run it like the business it is.

Fear #2 – “Will My Clients Care If I Switch Brokerages?”

Totally fair question. You’ve worked hard to build trust. The last thing you want is a switch that makes clients raise an eyebrow.

Here’s the truth: your clients don’t care about your brokerage nearly as much as you think. They didn’t hire your broker. They hired you – your expertise, your results, your ability to keep deals from crashing and burning at the 11th hour.

When you move to eXp Realty, nothing changes for your clients except what’s behind the scenes (read: better tech and faster service). They still get you, just with more tools and less overhead dragging you down.

Most clients won’t even notice you switched unless you tell them. And if they do ask? You get to say:
“I moved to the only profitable brokerage serving more families than any other and providing me with better resources, so I can do even more for you.”

That’s not a red flag. It’s a power move.

Fear #3 – “Will I Still Get Support Without a Physical Office?”

For agents used to popping into the office to grab a printer jam or corner their broker for a signature, the idea of a cloud-based brokerage might feel like a leap into the void.

But here’s the truth: the support at eXp Realty doesn’t disappear – it levels up.

Instead of waiting for your broker to get back from lunch (or vacation… or hiding), you get instant access to a full-time support team:

  • State-specific brokers are on call in eXp World, or email them.
  • Over 2000 full-time staff inside eXp’s cloud platform – no gatekeepers, no office politics.
  • Support that’s available when you actually need it, not just during Tuesday morning office hours.

The traditional office might have had a coffee machine and a fridge full of mystery Tupperware… but eXp Realty agents get faster answers, more accountability, and zero “wait and see” nonsense.

And if you’re someone who wants to leave the house, you’re covered. eXp Realty provides a free monthly Regus membership, giving you access to professional office space or business lounges to meet clients anytime or to just hang. Prefer to stay virtual? Build your own custom office inside eXp World – fully branded, client-friendly, and waiting for you every time you log in.

Once you experience cloud-based support that actually works, you’ll wonder why you ever wasted gas driving to ask a compliance question.

Fear #4 – “Is eXp Realty a Pyramid Scheme?”

Ah yes, the classic internet rumor. If you’ve been in real estate longer than five minutes, someone’s probably whispered, “Isn’t that eXp thing a pyramid scheme?”

Let’s clear this up once and for all: eXp Realty is not a pyramid scheme.

There are no lotions to sell. No inventory to buy. No awkward “opportunity” Zooms where someone’s uncle hits you with a whiteboard presentation.

Here’s what eXp Realty’s revenue share model actually is:

  • You refer a productive agent to eXp? You get a slice of the company’s commission split.
  • You’re not paid by the agent. You’re not their boss.
  • You don’t have to recruit anyone – ever.
  • Your income from revenue sharing is tied to real closings, not recruiting fluff.

It’s not a pyramid scheme.  It is a legit MLM business. Bottom line, it’s shared brokerage revenue – the money most traditional brokers keep for themselves, now redirected to the agents who help grow the company.

So no, you won’t be handing out flyers at Thanksgiving. Unless you really want to.

Fear #5 – “What If I Regret Joining eXp Realty?

This is the big one. The fear that lurks under all the others: What if I make the move and wish I hadn’t?

Totally valid. But here’s the truth:

Most experienced agents who join eXp Realty don’t regret the switch – they regret waiting so long to do it.

Once they’re in, they’re:

  • Keeping more of their commission, including 100% + payout for ICON agents.
  • Building stock ownership that they never had before.
  • Creating revenue share income that doesn’t rely on listings.
  • Running a more scalable business with fewer headaches.
  • Saying “no thanks” to royalty fees, desk fees, and the endless nickel-and-diming.

The only agents who regret eXp? The ones who didn’t choose a good sponsor team and tried to figure it all out solo. (P.S. That’s why we built Smart Agent Alliance.)

Here’s the part that shocks most agents -in a good way. If you ever decide that eXp Realty isn’t for you, or you take a break with plans to return under a different sponsor, eXp won’t hold your deals hostage. They’ll let you take all your signed contracts with you to your next brokerage. No penalties. No hidden fees. eXp takes nothing. They just wish you well and send you on your way like actual grown-ups.

So yeah, regret is real – but it’s usually on the side of staying stuck, not stepping up.

Addressing the Real Fears Allows You to See the Real Opportunity

Switching brokerages is a big deal, especially when you’ve built a brand, a client base, and a system that works. But once you look past the noise (and the myths), the real value of eXp Realty comes into focus:

? Keep more of your commissions with an 80/20 split, low cap, and path to 100% all year.
? Build wealth, not just income, with stock awards and equity options.
? Earn passive income (if you choose the right sponsor) through revenue share – only if you want to.
? Retain full control of your personal brand and marketing.
? Ditch the unnecessary fees that quietly bleed your bottom line.

So, should experienced agents join eXp Realty? If you’re ready for a smarter business model with more control, more freedom, and more long-term upside, the answer is probably that you should’ve done it already.

A Smarter Move with Smart Agent Alliance

And here’s where eXp Realty gets even better: your success isn’t just about the brokerage – it’s also about who brings you in. That’s because, unlike all other brokerages, eXp allows sponsors to provide exclusive direct support, coaching, and systems to the agents they personally bring in.

Smart Agent Alliance is one of eXp’s fastest-growing sponsor teams – and we’re actually two teams in one: Smart Agent Alliance + the Wolf Pack. That means double the support, double the strategy, and yes, still 100% free.

In fact, we’re the only major eXp sponsor team that gives everything away for free! No upsells. No bait-and-switch. Just full free access from day one.

But don’t confuse “free” with “basic.” Our tools are so valuable that we literally sell them to agents outside our team. Other coaches charge $10,000–$20,000 for similar trainings  (and yeah, ours are better). Plus, we’re constantly upgrading and innovating, and soon we’re dropping our most powerful resource yet. Our team gets it for free. Everyone else will have to buy it – and they will because they will need it!

Just name a Smart Agent Alliance founder as your primary sponsor in your join us eXp application and get access to our full value stack – including a personalized agent attraction funnel, automated follow-up, top social media training, lead-gen tools, custom landing pages, high-level training, and live weekly strategy calls. We even hand you plug-and-play marketing templates and a proven plan to grow your revenue share faster.

It’s the kind of sponsor-driven support that most agents wish they had picked the first time around. Want to learn more about this opportunity?  Secure your webinar spot today, then book a private call with Smart Agent Alliance.

Frequently Asked Questions

Should experienced agents join eXp Realty?

Yes. eXp Realty offers experienced agents more income potential, brand freedom, stock ownership, and optional passive income through revenue share.

Do I have to give up my brand if I join eXp Realty?

No. You keep full control of your brand, logo, and marketing. Just add “brokered by eXp Realty” in small print, like any brokerage affiliation.

Will my clients care if I switch to eXp Realty?

No. Clients care about you, not your brokerage. Most won’t even notice you switched unless you tell them.

How does support work at a virtual brokerage like eXp?

eXp offers real-time access to over 2,000 staff, brokers in every state, and free Regus office space plus a virtual office in eXp World.

Is eXp Realty a pyramid scheme?

No. eXp’s revenue share model is based on agent production. You’re never required to recruit, and there’s no selling or inventory.

What if I join eXp and regret it?

You can leave anytime, take your signed contracts with you, and eXp won’t penalize you. Most agents regret not joining eXp sooner.

What does Smart Agent Alliance offer agents who join?

Smart Agent Alliance provides free access to funnels, follow-up automation, social media training, coaching, and lead-gen tools for growing your business and revenue share.

title: eXp Realty vs Traditional Brokerages: Real Cost Difference for Top Producing Agents
excerpt: Key Points Traditional brokerages often take 20–30% of commissions, plus royalty and desk fees eXp Realty uses a simple 80/20 split with a $16K cap…
content:
Key Points

  • Traditional brokerages often take 20–30% of commissions, plus royalty and desk fees
  • eXp Realty uses a simple 80/20 split with a $16K cap and no hidden fees
  • Top producers keep more of their income at eXp, often $50K+ more per year
  • eXp agents earn additional income through revenue share and stock awards
  • Revenue share grows based on your downline’s production, not your own
  • eXp awards stock for production milestones and offers discounted stock purchases
  • Wealth at eXp compounds through passive income and equity, not just commissions
  • Traditional models fund the brokerage; eXp flips the profit model in favor of the agent
  • Smart Agent Alliance gives agents systems, support, and tools to scale faster at eXp

Let’s be honest – when you’re just starting out, you’re mostly thinking, “Please let someone answer my open house sign-in sheet.” But once you’re a few years in, you start asking smarter questions like, “Wait… why am I still giving my broker enough money each year to buy a Tesla?”

That’s when the real estate agent’s glow-up begins. Because being a top producer isn’t just about selling more homes – it’s about keeping more of what you earn. And suddenly, that shiny brand-name brokerage starts looking more like a money vacuum than a partner.

So if you’ve hit that point where your commission split feels more like a slow bleed and you’re wondering whether eXp Realty might finally let you keep what you earned – yeah, you’re not alone.

Let’s break down the eXp Realty vs traditional brokerages debate, pull the curtain back on what it costs to stay where you are, and show why so many top-producing agents are ditching desk fees and royalty charges in favor of multiple income streams and wealth-building potential.

Commission Splits: The Silent Paycheck Killer
How eXp Realty Fixes the Commission Math
How eXp Realty Unlocks Extra Income (That Traditional Brokerages Just… Don’t)

Revenue Share: Passive Income That Grows Without You
Stock Awards: Earn Equity While You Work
Stock Purchase Program: Build Wealth Automatically
Real-World Cost Scenario: Who’s Actually Taking Home the Money?
The Wealth Compound Effect: Keep More, Build More, Sooner
Traditional Brokerages Cap Your Income. eXp Realty Builds Your Exit Strategy.
The Bottom Line: Keep More. Build Wealth. Exit on Your Terms.
Frequently Asked Questions

Commission Splits: The Silent Paycheck Killer

When you’re an experienced agent, your biggest expense isn’t postcards or lockboxes – it’s the slow financial drain happening every time you close a deal. And guess where it’s going? Right back to your brokerage. And, hey, they need it. Someone’s got to pay for the office overhead and parade of franchise layers. There’s a whole conga line of expenses between your commission and your bank account.

Here’s the brutal truth most top producers face at traditional brokerages:

  • 70/30 splits are still a thing – yes, even if you’re bringing in $10M+ a year.
  • 95/5 splits might sound generous until you realize you’re still getting hit with…
  • Franchise and royalty fees slice off another 4–8%.
  • No cap structure, so you never graduate to 100%.
  • Desk, admin, and transaction fees sneak in like gremlins on every paycheck.

So even when you’re killing it, your brokerage is still the one growing its profit margin, not you.

How eXp Realty Fixes the Commission Math

Now let’s talk about a cost structure that doesn’t feel like financial sabotage because it’s not. By ditching the bloated office overhead and slicing out franchise middlemen, eXp leaves more of your hard-earned commission right where it belongs: in your bank account.

At eXp Realty, it’s refreshingly simple:

  • 80/20 split for every agent across the board.
  • $16,000 cap hit, and you’re at 100% commission for the rest of your year.
  • Meet certain requirements, and you get your $16,000 back in company stock.
  • No franchise fees.
  • No royalty fees.
  • No desk fees.

Translation?

  • Your costs are fixed.
  • Your income is yours.
  • Your extra deals? Pure profit after the cap.

For high performers, that’s not just a little boost. It’s a massive difference! Want to see the exact numbers? Run your own scenario with our eXp Realty Commission Calculator and prepare to be annoyed at how much you’ve been giving away.

How eXp Realty Unlocks Extra Income (That Traditional Brokerages Just… Don’t)

Let’s be real – at most traditional brokerages, your income is a one-trick pony. Close a deal, get paid. Don’t close? Don’t eat. You’re stuck in a production hamster wheel with zero backup plan.

eXp Realty flips that script by stacking multiple income streams into the brokerage model. So while other agents are still chasing their next deal, you’re quietly stacking wealth on autopilot.

Revenue Share: Passive Income That Grows Without You

At eXp, you’re not just earning commissions, you’re building a business.

Here’s how:

  • Bring agents into eXp through your network.
  • Earn monthly recurring income based on their production.
  • As your network grows, so does your revenue share –  no matter how much you’re personally producing.

It’s not just passive income. It’s scalable income. Want to see what that could look like? Check out our eXp Revenue Share Calculator.

Stock Awards: Earn Equity While You Work

Traditional brokerages give you plaques. eXp gives you stock.

You’ll earn eXp stock awards for:

  • Closing your first deal each year.
  • Capping each year.
  • And if you hit ICON status? Even more stock rewards just for being a high-level producer.

That’s real ownership in a real company – not just a seat at someone else’s table.

Stock Purchase Program: Build Wealth Automatically

Want to build equity without lifting a finger?
At eXp, you can choose to invest 5% of each commission check into eXp stock at a 5% discount.
You’re literally buying in below market every time you get paid.

Bottom line?

  • Revenue share = passive income
  • Stock awards = ownership
  • Discounted stock = long-term wealth

Try finding that kind of financial upside at a traditional brokerage. We’ll wait.

Real-World Cost Scenario: Who’s Actually Taking Home the Money?

Let’s stop talking theory and start talking numbers. Here’s what the commission split difference actually looks like for a top producer doing $10 million in sales.

Agent Production Example:

  • $10 million in annual sales volume
  • 10 transactions
  • 2.5% average commission = $250,000 in GCI

Traditional Brokerage (80/20 split + 6% royalty):

  • 20% split = $50,000
  • 6% royalty fee = $15,000
  • Total paid to brokerage = $65,000
  • Add another $4,000–$8,000 in random fees (desk, admin, transaction, etc.)

eXp Realty (80/20 split, $16K cap):

  • Plus about $1,870 in fixed, transparent transaction fees
  • 20% split until you hit the $16,000 cap
  • Then you’re at 100% commission for the rest of your year
  • Total paid to brokerage = $16,000

Net Difference?
Even before revenue share or stock awards kick in, you’re looking at $53,000+ more in your pocket at eXp Realty in just one year.

Multiply that over five years, and you’re not just comparing brokerages… you’re comparing retirement timelines.

The Wealth Compound Effect: Keep More, Build More, Sooner

Let’s talk more about that five-year difference. If you keep that extra $53,000 each year by switching to eXp Realty. Over five years, that’s a cool $265,000, and that’s without closing one extra deal.

But the real power move?

Stack on the other income streams mentioned above:

  • Revenue share that grows as your network grows
  • Stock awards that build equity with every milestone
  • Stock purchases that grow with market appreciation

Compound each of those over five years, and you’re not just saving money, you’re building wealth. And that’s when top producers start asking themselves:
“Why didn’t I do this sooner?”

Traditional Brokerages Cap Your Income. eXp Realty Builds Your Exit Strategy.

For decades, traditional brokerages thrived on high producers funding the company’s growth. You sell more, and they win bigger. But the game’s changed.

eXp Realty flips the script:

  • Low fees, no nickel-and-diming
  • No hidden royalties draining your check
  • Predictable costs and clear caps
  • Three income pillars: production, revenue share, and stock
  • Real equity in a profitable, publicly traded company
  • And, yes, an exit plan you can keep in retirement and even provide to your family after death. So, at eXp, you’re not just selling homes anymore. You’re building something that lasts.

The Bottom Line: Keep More. Build Wealth. Exit on Your Terms.

If you’re a top-producing agent, you already know how to close deals. The real question is: how much are you actually keeping and what’s it doing for your future?

Over time, the difference between eXp Realty vs traditional brokerages isn’t just in your take-home pay. It’s in your freedom – the kind that comes from recurring income, stock appreciation, and building something bigger than your next closing.

And if you’re serious about growing, let’s talk about the support system behind it all. When you choose Smart Agent Alliance as your sponsor at eXp Realty, you don’t just join the most agent-friendly brokerage in the industry – you get the combined firepower of two top sponsor teams: Smart Agent Alliance + the Wolf Pack.

Together, we’re known for agent-focused systems that actually move the needle with:

  • Full access to Social Agent Academy Pro (a $10.5K value)
  • Weekly coaching, private groups, and high-level strategy calls
  • A personal agent attraction page
  • Webinars & automated agent follow-up
  • 8 lead-generating landing pages with email automation
  • Hundreds of gorgeous plug-and-play marketing templates
  • Quick-start production plans & more

All FREE when you name a Smart Agent Alliance founder as your eXp sponsor.

You could gamble on a random eXp sponsor and hope they remember your name after onboarding. Or… you could join a team that’s already laid the tracks and all you have to do is ride.

Ready to see how much more you could be keeping (and building)? Secure your webinar spot today, then book a private call with Smart Agent Alliance.

Frequently Asked Questions

What is the commission split at eXp Realty for top producers?

eXp Realty offers an 80/20 split with a $16,000 annual cap. After you cap, you earn 100% commission for the rest of your anniversary year.

How does eXp Realty’s cost structure compare to traditional brokerages?

Traditional brokerages often have 20–30% splits, 4–8% royalty fees, and added desk/admin fees. eXp has no royalty or desk fees, just the 80/20 split up to the $16K cap and some small admin fees.

Can agents at eXp Realty earn passive income?

Yes. eXp’s revenue share model allows agents to earn monthly income from agents they sponsor, regardless of their own production.

What are the eXp Realty stock awards?

Agents earn stock for completing their first deal annually, reaching their cap, and achieving ICON status. These awards help agents build equity in the company.

How much more can top agents earn at eXp Realty?

In a sample scenario with $10M in sales volume and 10 deals, a top agent could keep $53,000 more per year at eXp compared to a traditional brokerage – even before stock or rev share. After five years, that’s more than $250,000.

Why eXp Is Built for Agents Who’ve Already Built Their Brand

This isn’t real estate kindergarten. You don’t need training wheels – you need a platform that respects what you’ve already built and stops punishing you for your production.

80/20 Split with a Low Cap

Your Brand Stays Your Brand

Cloud-Based, Not Clutter-Based

Easy Transitions

For experienced agents, this isn’t just a brokerage – it’s the upgrade your business has been waiting for.

Let’s face it: even top producers are one slow month away from watching their income nosedive. Traditional brokerages love you when you’re selling, but give you nothing when you stop.

eXp finally offers something your old brokerage never could: actual wealth-building.

Stock Awards That Don’t Expire with Your Mood

Revenue Share That Pays You to Grow
Bring top agents to eXp and earn a percentage of their production, month after month. It’s not some gimmick or MLM. It’s licensed agents doing business, and you are benefiting from the network you build.

Stock Purchase Program

title: Why So Many New Real Estate Agents Are Choosing eXp Realty
excerpt: Key Points Why new agents join eXp Realty? New agents need real training, not just franchise hype. eXp provides certified mentors for first transactions. FastCap…
content:
Key Points

  • Why new agents join eXp Realty? New agents need real training, not just franchise hype.
  • eXp provides certified mentors for first transactions.
  • FastCap training helps agents get 3.8 signed contracts in 6 weeks.
  • eXp offers 60+ hours of live weekly training taught by top agents.
  • Sponsor teams provide extra coaching and lead-gen resources.
  • No franchise, royalty, desk, or hidden fees at eXp Realty.
  • Full CRM (3 Choices), website, and business tools included for all agents.
  • Brokers and transaction managers available daily for real-time support.
  • eXp Realty Glassdoor reviews rank higher than industry averages.
  • Smart Agent Alliance sponsor team offers live coaching & family-like community.

Getting your real estate license feels like graduating straight into the Hunger Games. Everyone’s got advice. Every brokerage claims to have “the best support.” Your instructor tells you one thing, your cousin’s friend’s neighbor tells you something else, and recruiters? Yeah, they’re practically throwing confetti with how amazing their office is.

But here’s the real talk: you’re not just picking a brokerage – you’re picking the entire foundation of your career. The difference between closing deals fast… or burning through your savings while Googling how to get clients at 2am.

That’s exactly why so many brand-new agents – especially the ones who want to actually survive year one – are choosing eXp Realty. Here’s your handy-dandy index:

What New Agents Actually Need (That Most Brokerages Don’t Deliver)
How eXp Realty Solves the Biggest Challenges for New Agents

Certified Mentor Program
Training Systems
On-Demand Training Library
Broker and Transaction Support
Collaboration & Community
The Modern Brokerage Model That Actually Helps New Agents

Traditional Brokerages:
eXp Realty:
What New Agents Actually Say After Joining eXp
Why New Agents Are Succeeding Faster at eXp Realty
Frequently Asked Questions

What New Agents Actually Need (That Most Brokerages Don’t Deliver)

Let’s kill a few myths real quick: you don’t need a fancy lobby, a shiny franchise name, or an “atta boy” from your broker as they hand you a bill for desk fees. You need real stuff that actually helps you make money:

  • Real training: The kind that picks up where your license class left off (because let’s face it: your pre-license class basically taught you how not to get sued… and that’s it).
  • Hands-on mentorship: An actual experienced agent who helps you get clients and close deals – not one who vanishes when your first contract blows up.
  • Business systems: CRMs, websites, lead generation tools, and marketing systems already set up, so you’re not duct-taping it together while trying to find your next buyer.
  • Support: Brokers, transaction managers, and admin staff who answer you before your deal implodes – not after.
  • Modern marketing: Social media, video, online lead generation – not cold-calling scripts from 1987.

Sadly, most brokerages hand you a desk, a bill, and a “good luck out there.” Which is probably why so many new agents don’t make it past their first year.

How eXp Realty Solves the Biggest Challenges for New Agents

Here’s where eXp Realty stops playing around. They didn’t build this brokerage for agents who “want to figure it out someday.” They built it for new real estate agents who need an actual roadmap – not another motivational quote and a welcome packet.

Certified Mentor Program

Every new eXp Realty agent gets assigned an eXp certified mentor who’s walked this road before – and survived. This isn’t some random office manager who’s too busy managing office drama. This is one-on-one, deal-by-deal coaching from an experienced exp realty agent who helps you avoid rookie mistakes that blow up deals before you even cash your first commission check.

Training Systems

The training here isn’t just “how to fill out forms.” eXp Realty’s new real estate agent training is stacked:

  • Go Curriculum On-Demand: Business-building training that covers all the stuff your licensing class conveniently skipped.
  • FastCap Program: 6 weeks of live coaching that statistically helps new agents generate 3.8 signed contracts fast – because watching your bank account slowly die isn’t a strategy.
  • 60+ Hours of Live Weekly Training: Real-world topics like contracts, lead generation, marketing, negotiation, business planning, and more – all taught by top eXp agents and staff.
  • Bonus Sponsor Team Training: If you choose a powerful eXp Realty sponsor, many offer even more weekly live coaching stacked on top of eXp’s core training.

On-Demand Training Library

Access hundreds of hours of on-demand training 24/7 – because your business questions don’t only show up Monday through Friday, 9 to 5. Sponsor team libraries often add even more content so you’ve got the answers you need when you need them.

Broker and Transaction Support

Full-time state brokers and transaction managers are standing by every single business day via eXp World, Workplace Chat, or email. When your deal goes sideways (because at some point it will), you’re not left sending smoke signals and praying for a callback.

Collaboration & Community

Unlike traditional real estate brokerages that limit you to whoever happens to sit in your office, eXp Realty connects you to a national (and international) cloud-based community of eXp Realty agents. You learn directly from some of the most productive agents in the company – not just whoever drew the short straw at Tuesday’s office meeting.

The Modern Brokerage Model That Actually Helps New Agents

Most real estate brokerages still operate like it’s 1998 – complete with overpriced office space, mystery fees, and “team leaders” who take half your check while offering “mentorship” that mostly consists of vague advice like work harder.

Here’s the reality check:

Traditional Brokerages:

  • Desk fees. Franchise fees. Royalty fees. Admin fees. (Basically, a full-time job just paying your brokerage.)
  • Team leaders who split your commission but aren’t actually in the trenches helping you build your business.
  • Oh, and by the way, CRMs, websites, and marketing tools? Those often cost extra. Because apparently, closing deals wasn’t expensive enough already.

eXp Realty:

  • You start at an 80/20 commission split with a $16,000 cap  –  even as a new real estate agent.
  • You get a path to earn your $16,000 cap back in company stock – yep, earning 100% for the year.
  • No franchise fees. No royalty fees. No desk fees. No surprise monthly invoices that feel like subscription hell.
  • Your full CRM (choose BoldTrail, Lofty, or Cloze), your website (when you choose BoldTrail or Lofty), and full business systems are included in your $85/month fee.
  • You’re allowed (and encouraged) to build your personal brand from day one – because the brokerage shouldn’t own your face.
  • You can partner with a powerful sponsor team (aka your eXp sponsor) who loads you up with extra free resources, coaching, and lead-generation tools.
  • Want extra accountability? You can also join a production real estate team within eXp for even more structure – only if you want it.

At eXp Realty, you get the actual tools, support, and systems you need to grow your business – without getting crushed under fees before your first deal even closes.

What New Agents Actually Say After Joining eXp

You don’t have to take our word for it – actual eXp Realty agents are saying it loud and clear:

  • “If you’re a new real estate agent, the training and flexibility for working with eXp are exceptional. The network of professionals is unmatched.”
  • “Able to work fully remote and still get great training!”
  • “I get to work at an Agent-Obsessed company! They care, they want us to succeed, and the business model is aligned for our long-term benefit and success!”

And that’s not just a few happy campers. eXp Realty sits at a 4.6-star rating on Glassdoor, which is 21% higher than the industry average. When you filter to agents only? It jumps to 4.7 stars. Translation: the people actually doing the job are happy.

Here’s what new eXp agents consistently say after joining:

  • “I was nervous about not having a physical office, but the support is better than friends at traditional brokerages.”
  • “The mentor program helped me avoid mistakes that could have cost me my first deals.”
  • “Having daily access to brokers gave me confidence to handle contracts and negotiations quickly.”
  • “The live training made me feel like I actually knew what I was doing faster than I expected.”

If you’re a new real estate agent trying to avoid the classic first-year faceplant, this is the kind of support that keeps your deals – and your career – alive.

Why New Agents Are Succeeding Faster at eXp Realty

At the end of the day, it’s not about who has the biggest office lobby or the fanciest business cards. None of that helps you close your first deal. You need:

  • Actual clients.
  • Actual deals closed.
  • Actual people helping you build your business.

That’s exactly why so many new real estate agents are launching strong at eXp Realty – many closing their first transactions within just a few months.

And here’s where the Smart Agent Alliance sponsor team takes it even further. You’re not out there flailing on your own, trying to figure it all out. Our sponsor team meets multiple times each week on Zoom, giving you real-time access to top-producing eXp Realty agents sharing exactly what’s working in today’s market. We plug you into a connected group that feels more like a family than just another brokerage. You get coaching, collaboration, agent attraction training, Social Agent Academy Pro ($997/year value for all your social media training), a branded agent attraction website and so much more – without ever feeling like you’re stranded on some virtual island wondering what to do next.

This is how new agents stay plugged in, supported, and successful – while actually enjoying the process.

When you join Smart Agent Alliance at eXp Realty, you’re plugging into one of the strongest sponsor teams at eXp – combining the power of Smart Agent Alliance and the Wolf Pack – giving you all the resources and community you’ll need to succeed.

To learn more about eXp Realty and how Smart Agent Alliance helps new real estate agents win faster, secure your webinar spot today, then book a private call with Smart Agent Alliance.

Frequently Asked Questions

Why do so many new agents join eXp Realty?

New agents join eXp Realty for real training, certified mentorship, built-in business systems, daily broker support and the ability to choose a sponsor team that provides exclusive u0026amp; extensive free value that helps them succeed fast.

What kind of training does eXp Realty offer new agents?

eXp offers on-demand Go Curriculum, FastCap live coaching, 60+ hours of weekly training, and sponsor team bonus coaching for real-world agent success.

How does eXp Realty’s mentor program work?

New agents get a certified mentor who personally guides them through their first deals, helping avoid costly mistakes and building confidence early.

Does eXp Realty charge franchise or desk fees?

No. eXp Realty has no franchise fees, royalty fees, desk fees, or hidden monthly costs that burden new agents before closing deals.

How does the Smart Agent Alliance sponsor team help new agents?

Smart Agent Alliance offers multiple live Zoom trainings weekly, top-producer coaching, Social Agent Academy Pro ($997/yearu003c/au003e value for all your social media training), proven business strategies, a supportive community that feels like family, and more.
